entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as the one who will tell Harry about the changes in the rules. She is smiling and seems to be glad that the rules have been changed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people who are curious about the changes in the rules. He asks Mrs. Weasley what rules she is talking about.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people who are curious about the changes in the rules. He asks Mrs. Weasley what rules she is talking about.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the people who are curious about the changes in the rules. He bellowed out of the window asking Mrs. Weasley to tell them what's happening at Hogwarts.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the people who are curious about the changes in the rules. He asks Mrs. Weasley what rules she is talking about.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as the person who will tell Harry and his friends about the changes in the rules.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley will tell Harry about the changes in the rules.
Fred asks Mrs. Weasley to tell them what's happening at Hogwarts.
